item.title: Monica add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Monica add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Make no judgments where you have no compassion." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Monica add a quote by Boris Pasternak
item.description: "I don't like people who have never fallen or stumbled. Their virtue is lifeless and it isn't of much value. Life hasn't revealed its beauty to them. " -- Boris Pasternak

item.title: Monica add a quote by Václav Havel
item.description: "You can't spend your whole life criticizing something and then, when you have the chance to do it better, refuse to go near it." -- Václav Havel

item.title: Monica add a quote by C.G. Jung
item.description: "Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes." -- C.G. Jung

item.title: Monica add a quote by Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn
item.description: "The salvation of mankind lies only in making everything the concern of all" -- Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn

item.title: Monica add a quote by Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn
item.description: "Own only what you can always carry with you: know languages, know countries, know people. Let your memory be your travel bag." -- Aleksandr I. Solzhenitsyn
